Classes in org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.browser used by org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.browser
BrowserGssContext
          Subtype for GssContexts that operate in the browser
BrowserLayer
          An implementation of the Layer interface using the Safari/WHATWG Javascript CANVAS.
ChartPanel
          ChartPanel is a GWT Widget that intercepts events and translates them to the Chart interface as well as creating a View instance for the chart to render with.
Chronoscope
          Factory class and JS API interface for Chronoscope Charts

This class exports methods that can be used by both Java and JS to create and configure charts, as well as being a global sink for History events
